lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Richard D. The Board and staff of The New York Stem Cell Foundation (NYSCF) mourn the death of our longtime friend Richard D. Kaplan, whose generous support a decade ago played a critical role in starting NYSCF, and whose enthusiastic support of our mission never wavered. We extend our deepest condolences to his wife, Edwina Sandys; his sisters, Joan K. Davidson, Elizabeth K. Fonseca and Mary Kaplan; his stepsons, Mark P. Dixon and Hugo P. Dixon, and his step-granddaughter, Atalandi M. Dixon. Susan L. Solomon, CEO, New York Stem Cell Foundation 1/3
